text: Antanas Šurna (27 March 1939 - 19 May 2014) was a Lithuanian stage and movie actor. He has appeared in over 100 movies and 50 plays. He is thought to be one of the most successful actors in Lithuania. His career began during the late 1960s. He won many awards during his 40-year career. Šurna died suddenly from cardiac arrest in Vilnius, Lithuania, aged 75. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Lithuania Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Lithuanian actors Category:Movie actors Category:Stage actors
title: Antanas Šurna
